name: server
description: TeleHelp is a MERN stack web application that allows users to find and book sessions with experts in various fields (e.g., tutors, counselors, consultants). It features JWT-based authentication for users and experts, real-time chat via Socket.io, secure payments through Stripe, and expert availability management. Built with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, the platform also includes role-based access control, email confirmations, and a scalable backend API architecture.
author: Asim Nazir
